CATEGORY: Display and formatting functions, Mathematical functions, String functions
DESCRIPTION: Converts number to a string, in the base specified by radix.
EXAMPLE: <h3>FormatBaseN Example</h3> <p>Converts a number to a string in the base specified by Radix. <p> <cfoutput> <br>FormatBaseN(10,2): #FormatBaseN(10,2)# <br>FormatBaseN(1024,16): #FormatBaseN(1024,16)# <br>FormatBaseN(125,10): #FormatBaseN(125,10)# <br>FormatBaseN(10.75,2): #FormatBaseN(10.75,2)# </cfoutput> <h3>InputBaseN Example</h3> <p>InputBaseN returns the number obtained by converting a string, using base specified by Radix (an integer from 2 to 36).</p> <cfoutput> <br>InputBaseN("1010",2): #InputBaseN("1010",2)# <br>InputBaseN("3ff",16): #InputBaseN("3ff",16)# <br>InputBaseN("125",10): #InputBaseN("125",10)# <br>InputBaseN(1010,2): #InputBaseN(1010,2)# </cfoutput>
